text: Begonia furfuracea is a species of plant in the family Begoniaceae. It is found in Cameroon and Equatorial Guinea. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== furfuracea Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Joseph Dalton Hooker Category:Plants described in 1871
title: Begonia furfuracea
